comment.body:
>Every time you are forced to do something you never consented to you are being 'raped'.
So if tornado ruins your house and kills you - nature rapes you? I'd like to see if there was pregnancy cases out of those situations.
>Is a 'little bit' of rape (e.g. taxation) still OK?
Taxation is not rape you moron.

Most non-commercial organization like churches do not have to pay taxes. Join one and enjoy living in some commune like this.
Any other way you have to pay taxes to support existing infrastructure.
FYI
https://turbotax.intuit.com/tax-tips/general/how-are-federal-taxes-spent/L6kinGuUt

If you do not agree you can travel to some islamic country like Quatar with zero income tax. And comply with sharia laws.
If you want better laws and better infrastructure you pay for it. Pretty simple.

>the 'original' diaspora* was an effective alternative to Facebook and was gaining a lot of traction

Both statements are false. It never was an effective alternative. And diaspora's "lot of traction" is nothing compared to a facebook popularity.
